game.name: THE NEWZEALAND STORY: Untold Adventure
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: THE NEWZEALAND STORY comes back to life with Commodore Industries and Over The Game: experience the adventure of TIKI, the little Kiwi created by TAITO in 1988, in a colorful 2D platformer full of challenges and nostalgia!
game.shortDescriptionEn: THE NEWZEALAND STORY comes back to life with Commodore Industries and Over The Game: experience the adventure of TIKI, the little Kiwi created by TAITO in 1988, in a colorful 2D platformer full of challenges and nostalgia!
